record.field:
Dear ${object.employee_id.parent_id.name or 'Manager'},

A new alternative holiday request has been submitted by ${object.employee_id.name}.

Details:

  • Worked Date: ${object.worked_date}
  • Day Type: ${object.day_type == 'weekend' and 'Weekend' or 'Public Holiday'}
  • Requested Leave Date: ${object.requested_leave_date}
  • Reason: ${object.reason}

Please review the request in Odoo under "Alternative Holiday Request > Manager > Requests To Approve".

Best regards,
Odoo
